PROFILE
I am a dreamer who lives down to earth and is a hard-working,
flexible, caring, empathetic and willing-to-learn person who is
looking for a job in Content creating and Copywriting where I can
play with beautiful worlds everyday.
EXPERIENCE
HSBC VIETNAM

CAMPAIGN/PROMOTION

contents (SMS, eDM, landing page, standee, poster...)
Contact and supervise vendors during the on-going and
forthcoming events to ensure smooth operation:
communication materials drafting, POSM production and
distribution, installment and replacement, delivery
services.
Handle the approval-seeking procedure and follow up
with technical deployment of PWS and eDM.
Assist in logistic arrangements for promotion/campaigns

(data) for selection, preparing & deploying
announcement, contacting customers for gift delivery
and recording

New Card reports weekly
Monitor purchasing orders and payments

Industry and Trade
DIEN QUAN MEDIA & ENTERTAINMENT 
EXTERNAL AFFAIRS CUM CEO ASSISTANT  JAN - AUG 2018
Do tasks of public relations, search and contact clients
include internal and external clients, departments to arrange
appointment and meeting with CEO
Join with CEO in meeting with clients, trading, negotiation,
sign Contract
Maintain good relations with clients, customers to support
business and production of company
Follow the immediate supervise of CEO in customer‘s
strategies.
